dialogue: [color=#b38b2b]Piper[/color]...
Are you normal now? Have you snapped out of it?
Yeah.
Okay. Great.
I am so pissed with you right now.
... Sorry for trying to take over the world?
Come on.

All of that evil stuff, with the '[color=#e1ec43]Phantasia[/color]', and the evil [color=#8d7aa2]book[/color], and whatnot- was that really just you, or were you being controlled by the [color=#8d7aa2]book[/color]? Were you just... completely mad?
... It was just me. For a long time, I've always wanted... to make you happy. You’re my only friend in the world. My bestest friend. No matter what, I want to see you smile forever.
[color=#b38b2b]Piper[/color]… that’s really touching, but… I don't want you to treat me like some kind of helpless doe.
I'm not trying to.
I feel like you're always saving me. And now, you tried to 'fix' me, like there's something fundamentally wrong with me.
Well, you've saved the world, now, [color=#b38b2b]A5[/color]. So that's scored away.
What do you mean 'fix' me, [color=#b38b2b]Piper[/color]?

... the [color=#8d7aa2]book[/color] says that at the end of the story, there's no more 'us'. You'll wake up again outside of [color=#b38b2b]Wonderland[/color], at the start of the story, and you won't know who I am. 
So, to fix it... I have to win. The story ends with me, darkness, and you. If I win.
But that means everything is destroyed.
No. It'll restart again. You're never dead.
This still sounds completely mad.
We can't stop it.
Yes we can, there has to be a way. Use your crazy [color=#e1ec43]Phantasia[/color] powers and make us a happy ending.
What?
You're the one with the power to make anything, right? You've got the [color=#e1ec43]Phantasia[/color], the power of [color=#b38b2b]Wonderland[/color]. Anything you've always wanted will come true.
But... I don't. Or at least, at this point, I don't. Because I've always wanted to make you happy, and I've failed. You even defeated me.
That doesn't mean you still can't try to do something. Don't you want a good ending?
Well... yeah. But-
So do something- I want our ending, [color=#b38b2b]Piper[/color]. Even if I'm so mad with you right now for nearly destroying the world, you're still my best friend.
... Really? Even though I was willing to do it again?
[color=#b38b2b]Piper[/color], does your power give you the ability to know everyone's desires?
No, just the power to make them and my own come true.
Then, I'll say it right now. I've always wanted to tell you that I care about you, [color=#b38b2b]Piper[/color]. Even when I forget your name, I'll always remember how much I love you.
Even when I mess up?
Yeah.
This can't fix the [color=#8d7aa2]book[/color], or the forgetting, or... everything.
But is it enough for us?
...Yeah.
Then let's forget about the [color=#8d7aa2]book[/color]. We can rebuild everything.
We?
But you’re mad at me.
Not forever. Not you, [color=#b38b2b]Piper[/color]. My job as your best friend is to help you fix your mistakes. So, come on. Let’s make our own ending.
... Okay, let’s do it.
